entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 04:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.3°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 30 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
